snippet: The state is investigating allegations that the intelligence service tried to influence the recent presidential election.
abstract: State prosecutors raid headquarters of the National Intelligence Service of South Korea to investigate accusations that spy agency used its agents and hired bloggers to influence presidential election in December; highly unusual raid deals blow to reputation of agency.
lead_paragraph: The state is investigating allegations that the intelligence service tried to influence the recent presidential election.

headline.seo: Prosecutors Raid South Korean Spy Agency
headline.main: Prosecutors Raid South Korean Spy Agency in Presidential Election Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Raid South Korean Spy Agency in Presidential Election Inquiry
